about.description: Former Intel Contract | Former Founding Engineer at dating app Have You Met |

bullets: ● Leading the development of a MERN stack-based SaaS platform to optimize eCommerce operations, currently achieving a 20% increase in client operational efficiency.
● Orchestrated Agile/Scrum practices, enhancing collaboration between the core team and outsourced developers, along with marketing teams for product alignment.
● Initiated comprehensive market and technical research, integrating eCommerce trends into the platform's design, ensuring market relevance and competitive edge.

experiences.position: Founding Engineer at Have You Met, Inc.
bullets: ● Directed a lean frontend development team to launch MVPs for a social networking app, using React Native and Node.js, leading to a 30% surge in user engagement.
● Constructed a robust internal data platform (social API) using AWS, enhancing user matching efficiency and expanding user base and market reach by 25%.
● Implemented CI/CD practices (Github Actions) for rapid iteration and deployment, facilitating a culture of rapid learning and adaptation to user feedback.
● Hosted weekly talks for knowledge exchange within the team.
● Developed and executed a comprehensive marketing strategy, increasing client acquisition by 40% and retention by 25%.
● Designed and implemented a data-driven marketing dashboard, enabling the team to make data-informed decisions, leading to a 30% increase in marketing ROI.
● Led the development of a marketing automation platform, reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks by 50% and increasing the team's productivity by 30%.
